name: Magnetic Dagger
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: **This turn:** Enemy units in radius cannot be swapped or placed by themselves or by enemy heroes.

name: Crackling Dagger
text:
Target a hero adjacent to you.
After the attack: **This turn:** Enemy units in radius cannot be swapped or placed by themselves or by enemy heroes.

name: Static Barrier
text: **This turn:** While an enemy hero outside of radius is performing an action, spaces in radius count as obstacles. While an enemy hero in radius is performing an action, spaces outside of radius count as obstacles.

name: High Voltage
text:
Each time after you perform a basic skill, you may defeat an enemy minion in radius;
an enemy hero who was adjacent to that minion discards a card, if able.

name: Lift Up
text: Move a unit, or a token, in radius 1 space, without moving it away from you or closer to you. May repeat once on the same target.

name: Shock
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: An enemy hero in radius and not adjacent to you discards a card, if able.

name: Control Gravity
text:
Move a unit, or a token, in radius 1 space, without moving it away from you, or closer to 
you. May repeat once on the same target.

name: Electrocute
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: An enemy hero in radius and not adjacent to you discards a card, if able.

name: Deflect Projectiles
text: Block a ranged attack; if you do, an enemy hero in range, other than the attacker, discards a card, if able.

name: Kinetic Repulse
text: Push up to 2 enemy units adjacent to you 3 spaces; if a pushed hero is stopped by an obstacle, that hero discards a card, if able.

name: Charged Boomerang
text:
Target a unit in range and not in a straight line.
_(Units adjacent to you are in a straight line from you.)_

name: Telekinesis
text: Place a unit or a token in range, which is not in a straight line, into a space adjacent to you.

name: Center of Mass
text: Move a unit, or a token, in radius 1 space, without moving it away from you, or closer to you. May repeat up to two times on the same target.

name: Electroblast
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: An enemy hero in radius and not adjacent to you discards a card, or is defeated.

name: Reflect Projectiles
text: Block a ranged attack; if you do, an enemy hero in range discards a card, if able.

name: Kinetic Blast
text: Push up to 2 enemy units adjacent to you 3 or 4 spaces; if a pushed hero is stopped by an obstacle, that hero discards a card, if able.

name: Thunder Boomerang
text:
Target a unit in range and not in a straight line.
After the attack: If you targeted a hero, may repeat once on a different target.

name: Mass Telekinesis
text: Place a unit or a token in range, which is not in a straight line, into a space adjacent to you. May repeat once.
